<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="/static/xml/mkform.xsl"?>
<config version="001" module="sky_partitioner">
  <section id="Sky partitioner">
    <subsection id="Partition setup">
      <scalar default="healpix" type="string" name="Partition method" id="partition_method">
        <values>
          <value value="healpix">Healpix</value>
          <value value="des_tiles">DES tiles</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
    </subsection>
    <subsection id="Healpix setup">
      <scalar default="32" type="int" name="Healpix nside" id="healpix_nside">
        <values>
          <!--value>1</value><value>2</value-->
          <value>4</value>
          <value>8</value>
          <value>16</value>
          <value>32</value>
          <value>64</value>
          <value>128</value>
          <value>256</value>
          <value>512</value>
          <value>1024</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
      <scalar default="true" type="string" name="Optimize Healpix nside reduction grouping sub-pixels of the same super-pixel in the same job" id="healpix_group_nside_reduction_by_job">
        <values>
          <value value="true">Yes</value>
          <value value="false">No</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
    </subsection>
    <subsection id="DES tiles setup">
      <scalar default="1" type="int" name="Number of DES Tiles per Job" id="tiles_per_job">
        <values>
          <value>1</value>
          <value>2</value>
          <value>4</value>
          <value>8</value>
          <value>12</value>
          <value>24</value>
          <value>32</value>
          <value>48</value>
          <value>64</value>
          <value>128</value>
          <value>256</value>
          <value>512</value>
          <value>1024</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
    </subsection>
  </section>
</config>

<config version="001" module="query_builder">
  <section id="General Information">
    <subsection id="Description">
      <scalar default="Cluster Catalog" type="string" name="Name" id="catalog_name">
        <values>
          <value>Cluster Catalog</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
      <text default="None" type="string" name="Description" id="catalog_description">
        <values>
          <value>None</value>
        </values>
      </text>
    </subsection>
  </section>
  <section id="Region Selection">
    <subsection id="Map Resolution">
      <scalar default="4096" type="string" name="HEALPix Map Resolution" id="healpix_map_resolution">
        <values>
          <value>4096</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
    </subsection>
    <subsection id="Detfrac Map (mangle_maps)">
      <scalar default="None" type="string" name="g" id="mangle_area_fraction_g">
        <values>
          <value>None</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
      <scalar default="None" type="string" name="r" id="mangle_area_fraction_r">
        <values>
          <value>None</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
      <scalar default="0.8" type="string" name="i" id="mangle_area_fraction_i">
        <values>
          <value>0.8</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
      <scalar default="None" type="string" name="z" id="mangle_area_fraction_z">
        <values>
          <value>None</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
      <scalar default="None" type="string" name="Y" id="mangle_area_fraction_Y">
        <values>
          <value>None</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
      <scalar default="i" type="string" name="Reference band to report area" id="reference_band_area">
        <values>
          <value>g</value>
          <value>r</value>
          <value>i</value>
          <value>z</value>
          <value>Y</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
    </subsection>
    <subsection id="Bad Regions Mask (bright_mask)">
      <checkbox default="unchecked" type="bad_regions" name="1 - Regions with bad astrometric colors" id="bad_regions_1">
        <values>
          <value>bad_regions_1</value>
        </values>
      </checkbox>
      <checkbox default="checked" type="bad_regions" name="2 - Fainter 2MASS star region (8 < J < 12)" id="bad_regions_2">
        <values>
          <value>bad_regions_2</value>
        </values>
      </checkbox>
      <checkbox default="checked" type="bad_regions" name="4 - Large nearby object (R3C catalog)" id="bad_regions_4">
        <values>
          <value>bad_regions_4</value>
        </values>
      </checkbox>
      <checkbox default="checked" type="bad_regions" name="8 - Bright 2MASS star region (5 < J < 8)" id="bad_regions_8">
        <values>
          <value>bad_regions_8</value>
        </values>
      </checkbox>
      <checkbox default="unchecked" type="bad_regions" name="16 - Near the LMC" id="bad_regions_16">
        <values>
          <value>bad_regions_16</value>
        </values>
      </checkbox>
      <checkbox default="checked" type="bad_regions" name="32 - Yale Bright Star region" id="bad_regions_32">
        <values>
          <value>bad_regions_32</value>
        </values>
      </checkbox>
      <checkbox default="unchecked" type="bad_regions" name="64 - High density of crazy colors" id="bad_regions_64">
        <values>
          <value>bad_regions_64</value>
        </values>
      </checkbox>
      <checkbox default="unchecked" type="bad_regions" name="128 - In v1.0.1, but not v1.0.2" id="bad_regions_128">
        <values>
          <value>bad_regions_128</value>
        </values>
      </checkbox>
      <checkbox default="unchecked" type="bad_regions" name="256 - Globular Clusters" id="bad_regions_256">
        <values>
          <value>bad_regions_256</value>
        </values>
      </checkbox>
      <checkbox default="unchecked" type="bad_regions" name="512 - COADD PSF failures" id="bad_regions_512">
        <values>
          <value>bad_regions_512</value>
        </values>
      </checkbox>
    </subsection>
    <subsection id="Depth Map (depth_maps)">
      <scalar default="Yes" type="string" name="Apply Depth Map?" id="apply_depth_map">
        <values>
          <value>Yes</value>
          <value>No</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
      <scalar default="AUTO" type="string" name="Magnitude type" id="depth_type">
        <values>
          <value>AUTO</value>
          <value>APER_4</value>
        </values>
      </scalar>
      <scalar default="5" type="string" name="Signal to noise ratio" id="snr">

          <value>10</value>
